page.title: 12PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content:
There are lots of{Public Houses}in {Lockwood.}These are some of the names of Pubs in Lockwood:{Woolpack, The {Swan, The Red Lion, The White Lion, and{The Railway.}The Railway is on the corner of{Park Rd}and{Yew Green Rd.}I live in the{Railway.}It is my home. Inside there are{2 ladies toilets}and {1 gentlemans toilets.}There is a tiny room for a{telephone.}There is a room with a{dart board}on the wall. It has got a{Juke-box , a bandit}(gaming machine),{cigarette machine, 2 fires and a{television.}There is a small {trophy-room}and it has a{bandit.}There is only{1 table}although you can sit at the{bar.}We have one room with a {dart-board, pool-table}and a{fire. There are chairs{around the edge}of the room.
{LINDSEY WAIN MOUNT PLEASANT Jnrs.
